title: Ceiba Tree at Mompos, Champan Canoe, Trees, and a Partial Boat, Rio Magdelena, Colombia
description: Horizontal sheet containing a series of 4 sketches:  A house stands beside an enormous tree at Mompos, at top left;  a part of a covered canoe, at top right;  tree, at bottom left; and a part of a boat, at right.
name: Drawing
